# Necromancy (Staff)
## Overview
**Aura** strong necromancy; **CL** 13th

**Slot** none

**Price** 82,000 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

This staff is made from ebony or other dark wood and carved with images of bones and skulls mingled with strange spidery runes. It allows use of the following spells:

- *[[Cause Fear (Spell)|Cause fear]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Ghoul Touch (Spell)|Ghoul touch]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Halt Undead (Spell)|Halt undead]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Enervation (Spell)|Enervation]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Waves of Fatigue (Spell)|Waves of fatigue]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Circle of Death (Spell)|Circle of death]]* (3 charges)

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Staff (Feat)|Craft Staff]], *[[Cause Fear (Spell)|cause fear]], [[Circle of Death (Spell)|circle of death]], [[Enervation (Spell)|enervation]], [[Ghoul Touch (Spell)|ghoul touch]], [[Halt Undead (Spell)|halt undead]], [[Waves of Fatigue (Spell)|waves of fatigue]]*

**Cost** 41,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 494
